title: Prohibits the posting of pornographic content

tosdr.case: Prohibits the posting of pornographic content
tosdr.tldr: Full quote: "You will not use (or assist others in using) our Services in ways that: (a) violate, misappropriate, or infringe the rights of WhatsApp, our users, or others, including privacy, publicity, intellectual property, or other proprietary rights. (b) are illegal,obscene,"
